txt.en: The seeds once contained in this pouch were entrusted to Trotsiv of the Earth-kin, and he protected them from those who would do them harm. Though the pouch was brought into Mordor, and corruption ensnared it, the seeds within could not be ruined or destroyed, and now you have cleansed it of that evil. Elrond has imbued it with the Light of EÃ¤rendil, and believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
